text: General computer vision related query. Is there any easy way to shrink an image without losing very strong edges?

elements.text: General computer vision related query. Is there any easy way to shrink an image without losing very strong edges?

text: I didn't click on the video, and I don't know of a standard approach, but with `mapwindow` you can specify a "skip" between pixels. I'd imagine that running `median` or `quantile` on each window might be effective? I'm just making that up off the top of my head.
